info.title: HTTP RPC
info.description: Exposing RPCOps interfaces as OpenAPI WebServices

items.example: No example available for this type

put.description: Updates a section of the cluster configuration.

get.description: List all CPIs uploaded to the cluster.

parameters.description: Short form of the Holder Identifier

get.description: Get list of keys for members.

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: How to order the results (one of: none, timestamp, category, scheme_code_name, alias, master_key_alias, external_id, id, timestamp_desc, category_desc, scheme_code_name_desc, alias_desc, master_key_alias_desc, external_id_desc or id_desc)

schema.description: How to order the results (one of: none, timestamp, category, scheme_code_name, alias, master_key_alias, external_id, id, timestamp_desc, category_desc, scheme_code_name_desc, alias_desc, master_key_alias_desc, external_id_desc or id_desc)

parameters.name: createdafter
parameters.description: Only keys that had been created after (for example: 2007-12-03T10:15:30.00Z)

schema.description: Only keys that had been created after (for example: 2007-12-03T10:15:30.00Z)

parameters.name: createdbefore
parameters.description: Only keys that had been created before (for example: 2007-12-03T10:15:30.00Z)

schema.description: Only keys that had been created before (for example: 2007-12-03T10:15:30.00Z)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID's of the keys (Will ignore any other parameter)
